p: For M. luteus, mean inhibition zones of 2:1 PE plant modified group were significantly higher than the control group. However, CHX-GIC group was significantly the highest followed by 2:1 PE group compared to the other tested groups, see Fig. 2. This can be explained on the basis that M. luteus is very sensitive to chlorhexidine which can be efficiently taken up by the bacteria according to Wendel et al. [ 38].
